## Running multiple models

```{r}

plot_estimates <- model_estimates %>% 
  ggplot(aes(
    x = estimate, 
    y = metabolite,
    xmin = estimate - std.error,
    xmax = estimate + std.error
  )) +
  geom_pointrange()
plot_estimates

```
